longDescription: The Crab is a fish that can be found in the ocean during any season using a Crab Pot. It can also be dropped by a Rock Crab (15% chance) or Lava Crab (25% chance) when slain.

name: cockle
source: Ocean, The Beach using a Crab Pot
basicDescription: A common saltwater clam.
longDescription: The Cockle is a fish that can be found in the ocean during any season using a crab pot. It can also be foraged from the Beach.

name: mussel
source: Ocean, The Beach, using a Crab Pot
basicDescription: A common bivalve that often lives in clusters.
longDescription: The Mussel is a fish that can be found in the ocean during any season using a Crab Pot. It can also be foraged from the Beach.

name: shrimp
basicDescription: A scavenger that feeds off the ocean floor. Widely prized for its meat.
longDescription: The Shrimp is a fish that can be found in the ocean during any season using a Crab Pot.

name: snail
source: Farm Ponds, River, Mountain Lake, Forest Pond with a Crab Pot
basicDescription: A wide-ranging mollusc that lives in a spiral shell.
longDescription: The Snail is a fish that can be found in freshwater in any season by using a Crab Pot.

name: periwinkle
source: Farm Ponds, River, Lake, using a Crab Pot
basicDescription: A tiny freshwater snail that lives in a blue shell.
longDescription: The Periwinkle is a fish that can be found in freshwater during any season using a Crab Pot.

name: oyster
source: Ocean, The Beach, using a Crab Pot.
basicDescription: Constantly filters water to find food. In the process, it removes dangerous toxins from the environment.
longDescription: The Oyster is a fish that can be found in the ocean during any season using a crab pot. It can also be foraged from the Beach.

name: seaweed
basicDescription: It can be used in cooking.
longDescription: Seaweed is an item that can be found in the ocean by fishing during all seasons. There is a 41% chance to catch Seaweed while fishing in the deep-sea submarine ride at the Night Market. Catching Seaweed gives 3 Fishing XP.

name: greenAlgae
basicDescription: It's really slimy.
longDescription: Green Algae is an item that can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons, with the exception of the Farm Pond of the Standard Farm. When caught while fishing, Green Algae gives 3 Fishing XP. It's also a rare drop from Green Slimes.

name: whiteAlgae
basicDescription: It's super slimy.
longDescription: White Algae is an item which can be commonly caught while Fishing in The Mines, The Sewers, The Mutant Bug Lair,The Witch's Swamp or rarely in the Ocean. When caught while fishing, White Algae gives 3 Fishing XP. White Algae can also be dropped by several Monsters: Grubs, Mutant Grubs, Flies, Mutant Flies, Bugs, and Red and Purple Slimes.

name: amaranth
basicDescription: A purple grain cultivated by an ancient civilization
longDescription: Amaranth is a vegetable crop that grows from Amaranth Seeds after 7 days. Amaranth is harvested using a Scythe.

name: artichoke
basicDescription: The bud of a thistle plant. The spiny outer leaves conceal a fleshy, filling interior.
longDescription: The Artichoke is a vegetable crop that grows from Artichoke Seeds after 8 days. The seeds are available from Pierre's General Store starting in Year 2.

name: beet
basicDescription: A sweet and earthy root vegatable. As a bonus, the leaves make a great salad
longDescription: The Beet is a vegetable crop that grows from Beet Seeds after 6 days. Beet Seeds can be purchased from the Oasis. Players have the ability to craft Sugar from Beets by using a Mill. Once placed in the mill, one Beet will make three sugar. Sugar will appear in the box on the right side of the mill the following morning.

name: bokChoy
source: Bok Choy Seeds in the Fall
basicDescription: The leafy greens and fibrous stalks are healthy and delicious
longDescription: Bok Choy is a vegetable crop that grows from Bok Choy Seeds after 4 days.

name: cauliflower
basicDescription: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are packed with nutrients.
longDescription: Cauliflower is a vegetable crop that grows from Cauliflower Seeds after 12 days. Cauliflower is one of only three crops that can grow into a giant crop.

name: corn
source: Corn Seeds in the Summer and Fall
basicDescription: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a summer favorite.
longDescription: Corn is a vegetable crop that grows from Corn Seeds after 14 days.

name: eggplant
basicDescription: A rich and wholesome relative of the tomato. Delicious fried or stewed.
longDescription: Eggplant is a vegetable crop that grows from Eggplant Seeds after 5 days.

name: fiddleheadFern
source: Foraging in the Secret Woods in the Summer
basicDescription: The young shoots are an edible Specialty.
longDescription: The Fiddlehead Fern is a foraged vegetable found in the Secret Woods during Summer. Despite being a foraged item, its sell price increases by the Tiller profession bonus amount (10%), even though that profession is associated with skill in farming.

name: garlic
basicDescription: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be pretty spicy.
longDescription: Garlic is a vegetable crop that grows from Garlic Seeds after 4 days. The seeds are available at Pierre's General Store starting in Year 2.

name: greenBean
basicDescription: A juicy little bean with a cool, crist snap.
longDescription: The Green Bean is a vegetable crop that grows from Bean Starter after 10 days. This crop uses a trellis, and continues to produce after maturity. Be aware, you cannot move onto a tile with a trellis, but you must be adjacent to a planted tile in order to harvest the plant. You must plan the layout of your plantings in order to guarantee access for harvesting.

name: hops
basicDescription: A bitter, tangy flower used to flavor beer.
longDescription: Hops is a vegetable crop that grows from Hops Starter after 11 days in the Summer. Hops can be put into a Keg to make Pale Ale. Pale Ale has one of the highest returns on investment in the game, surpassed only by Starfruit wine.

name: kale
basicDescription: The waxy leaves are great in soups and stir frys.
longDescription: Kale is a vegetable crop that grows from Kale Seeds after 6 days. Kale is harvested using a Scythe.

name: parsnip
basicDescription: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.
longDescription: The Parsnip is a vegetable crop that grows from Parsnip Seeds after 4 days.

name: potato
basicDescription: A widly cultivated tuber.
longDescription: The Potato is a vegetable crop that grows in the Spring from Potato Seeds after 6 days.  When harvested, each Potato plant gives 1 potato, with a random chance to produce extra potatoes, partially based on Daily Luck.

name: pumpkin
basicDescription: A fall favorite, grown for its crunchy seeds and delicately flavored flesh. As a bonus, the hollow shell can be carved into a festive decoration.
longDescription: The Pumpkin is a vegetable crop that grows from Pumpkin Seeds after 13 days. It is one of three crops which might produce a giant crop, along with Cauliflower and Melon. After Starfruit it has the second-highest per unit base price of all the normal crops.

name: radish
basicDescription: A crisp and refreshing root vegetable with hints of pepper when eaten raw.
longDescription: The Radish is a vegetable crop that grows from Radish Seeds after 6 days.

name: redCabbage
source: Red Cabbage Seeds in the Summer
basicDescription: Often used in salads and coleslaws. The color can range from purple to blue to green-yellow depending on soil conditions.
longDescription: Red Cabbage is a vegetable crop that grows from Red Cabbage Seeds after 9 days. The seeds are available starting in Year 2. There is a small chance of buying Red Cabbage or Red Cabbage Seeds from the Traveling Cart.

name: tomato
basicDescription: Rich and slightly tangy, the Tomato has a wide variety of culinary uses.
longDescription: The Tomato is a vegetable crop that grows from Tomato Seeds after 11 days. When harvested, each Tomato plant gives 1 Tomato every 4 days, with a small random chance for more Tomatoes.

name: wheat
source: Wheat Seeds in the Summer and Fall
basicDescription: One of the most widely cultivated grains. Makes a great flour for breads and cakes.
longDescription: Wheat is a vegetable crop that grows from Wheat Seeds after 4 days. Wheat is harvested using a Scythe. In addition to Beer, players have the ability to craft Wheat Flour from Wheat by using a Mill. Once placed in the mill, one wheat will make one wheat flour. Wheat flour will appear in the box on the right side of the mill the following morning.

name: yam
basicDescription: A starchy tuber with a lot of culinary verstatility
longDescription: The Yam is a vegetable crop that grows from Yam Seeds after 10 days. It also has a 3% chance of dropping from Duggies.

name: wildHorseradish
basicDescription: A spicy root found in the spring
longDescription: Wild Horseradish is found via foraging in the Spring, or grown from Spring Seeds. Putting a Wild Horseradish in a Seed Maker will generate 1-3 Spring Seeds.

name: daffodil
source: Foraging in the Spring or grown from Spring Seeds
basicDescription: A traditional spring flower that makes a nice gift.
longDescription: The Daffodil is found via foraging in the Spring, or grown from Spring Seeds. Although it is a flower in its description (and in real life), the game classifies it as 'Forage' and not 'Flower'.

name: leek
basicDescription: A tasty relative of the onion.
longDescription: The Leek is found via foraging in the Spring, or grown from Spring Seeds. On Tuesdays, Evelyn may say that they can be found in the mountains, where they may be more common, but Leeks can be found above ground throughout Stardew Valley.

name: dandelion
basicDescription: Not the prettiest flower, but the leaves make a good salad.
longDescription: The Dandelion is found via foraging in the Spring, or grown from Spring Seeds. Up to ten can also be purchased from Pierre at the Flower Dance. Although it is a flower in its description (and in real life), the game classifies it as 'Forage' and not 'Flower'.

name: springOnion
basicDescription: These grow wild during the spring
longDescription: The Spring Onion is found via foraging in Spring in Cindersap Forest in the area north of the Sewer entrance. The Livin' Off The Land Television channel airs a tip about Spring Onions on day 4. Spring Onions also can be purchased from Traveling Cart for Gold.png100-1,000g. Once the player has earned 8 hearts of friendship with Jas and Vincent, Spring Onion Mastery can be obtained, which permanently increases the sell price of Spring Onions by 5.

name: morel
source: Foraging in the Secret Woods or grown in The Cave
basicDescription: Sought after for its unique nutty flavor
longDescription: The Morel is a mushroom found in the Spring via foraging in the Secret Woods or on the Forest Farm. It can also be found in the the Cave after choosing the mushroom option.

name: commonMushroom
source: Foraging around Stardew Valley, or grown in The Cave
basicDescription: Slightly nutty, with a good texture
longDescription: The Common Mushroom is a mushroom found via foraging throughout Stardew Valley in the Fall. They can also be found in the Secret Woods during Spring and Fall and on the Forest Farm during Summer. They can be grown from Wild Seeds (Fa) or in mushroom bins in the The Cave if the mushroom option is chosen. They can also be obtained by tapping a Mushroom Tree. Putting a Common Mushroom in a Seed Maker will generate 1-3 Fall Seeds.

name: salmonberry
source: Foraging in bushes around Stardew Valley
basicDescription: A spring-time berry with the flavor of the forest
longDescription: The Salmonberry is a foraged fruit found on bushes in Stardew Valley during Salmonberry Season (Spring 15-18). It won't be found in the wild outside those days. It can be found at any time (randomly) in the Farm Cave if the fruit bat option is chosen. At Foraging Skill Level 4, two berries will be harvested from each bush instead of one. At Foraging Skill Level 8, three berries will be harvested from each bush. If Foraging Skill is temporarily increased to 12 or 13 by consuming food, then 4 berries will be harvested from each bush. However, Salmonberries themselves give no foraging experience when harvested. Salmonberry has the lowest sell value of any foraged item, making it one of the few fruits that is worth more as a Jelly than a Wine. It can also make them more useful for gifting or eating than for selling. Salmonberries shaken from bushes during Salmonberry Season will always be regular quality, unless the Botanist Profession is chosen, in which case they will always be iridium quality. Salmonberries found in The Farm Cave can be normal, silver, or gold quality unless the Botanist Profession is chosen, in which case they will always be iridium quality.

name: spiceBerry
source: Foraging in the Summer, or grown from Summer Seeds
basicDescription: It fills the air with a pungent aroma
longDescription: The Spice Berry is a fruit found via foraging in the Summer or grown from Summer Seeds. Putting a Spice Berry in a Seed Maker will generate 1-3 Summer Seeds.

name: grape
source: Foraging in the Summer or grown in the Fall
basicDescription: A sweet cluster of fruit.
longDescription: The Grape is a fruit crop that grows from Grape Starter in the Fall, which takes 10 days to grow. They can also be foraged in Pelican Town, in the Summer, or grown from Summer Seeds. The sales price of grapes that are grown as a crop (in Fall) receive the Tiller profession bonus (as do all crops). However, the sales price of grapes foraged (in Summer), do not receive the bonus. (Note: there seems to be a program bug in the price that arises when you sell a mixture of crop and forage grapes at the same time.)

name: sweetPea
source: Foraging in the Summer or grown from Summer Wild Seeds
basicDescription: A gragrant summer flower
longDescription: The Sweet Pea is a flower found via foraging in the Summer or grown from Summer wild seeds.

name: redMushroom
source: Foraging in the Secret Woods in the Summer or grown in The Cave
basicDescription: A spotted mushroom sometimes found in caves
longDescription: The Red Mushroom is found in The Mines, via foraging in the Secret Woods in the Summer and (more rarely) Fall, grown in the The Farm Cave if the mushroom option is chosen, on the farm in fall if the Forest Farm Map has been chosen, or from a tapped Mushroom Tree. It may also be occasionally found in Garbage Cans or at the Traveling Cart.

name: wildPlum
source: Foraging in the Fall or grown from Fall Seeds
basicDescription: Tart and juicy with a pungent aroma
longDescription: The Wild Plum is a fruit found via foraging throughout Stardew Valley in the Fall. It can also be grown from Fall Seeds.

name: hazelnut
source: Foraging in the Fall or grown from Fall Seeds
basicDescription: That's one big hazelnut!
longDescription: The Hazelnut is found via foraging throughout Stardew Valley in the Fall. It can also be grown from Fall Seeds. Clicking on a Maple Tree during Fall has a chance to cause a hazelnut to drop from the tree.

name: blackberry
source: Foraging in the Fall or grown from Fall Seeds
basicDescription: An early-fall treat.
longDescription: The Blackberry is a Fruit found via Foraging throughout Stardew Valley. It can be found on the ground during Fall and on bushes during Blackberry Season (Fall 8-11). It can also be grown from Wild Seeds (Fa) (also known as Fall Seeds). During blackberry season, the number of berries obtained from each blackberry bush increases as Foraging Skill increases. At Level 4, two berries will be harvested from each bush instead of one. At Level 8, three berries will be harvested from each bush. If Foraging Skill is temporarily increased to 12 or 13 by consuming food, then 4 berries will be harvested from each bush. Blackberries shaken from bushes during Blackberry Season will always be regular quality, unless the Botanist Profession is chosen, in which case they will always be iridium quality. Blackberries picked up from the ground or grown from Fall Seeds will be normal, silver, or gold quality unless the Botanist Profession is chosen, in which case they will always be iridium quality.

name: chanterelle
source: Foraging in the Fall or grown in The Cave
basicDescription: A tasty mushroom with a fruity smell and slightly peppery flavor.
longDescription: The Chanterelle is found via foraging in the Secret Woods in the Fall or grown in The Farm Cave if the Mushroom option is chosen.

name: winterRoot
source: Foraging in the Winter or grown from Winter Seeds or from Tilling the soil
basicDescription: A starchy tuber
longDescription: The Winter Root is a foraging item found only in Winter. Unlike other forage items found on the ground, to obtain a Winter Root, you must dig with the Hoe. It's not necessary to dig at an Artifact Spot, although Winter Root may be found at Artifact Spots. A Winter Root may be found by digging any tillable soil in Stardew Valley outside of The Farm, including The Desert. They may also be grown from Winter Wild Seeds. Occasionally they may be sold at the Traveling Cart or found in Garbage Cans in Winter. They may also be dropped by Blue Slimes (8% chance) in The Mines (floors 40-80) or Secret Woods. Putting a Winter Root in a Seed Maker will generate 1-3 Winter Seeds. Winter Roots give no foraging experience when harvested around town.

name: crystalFruit
source: Foraging in the winter or grown from Winter Seeds
basicDescription: A delicate fruit that pops up from the snow.
longDescription: The Crystal Fruit is found via foraging in the Winter, by killing Dust Sprites in The Mines (floors 40 to 80), or by growing Winter wild seeds.

name: snowYam
source: Tilling the soil or grown from Winter Seeds or foraging in the Winter
basicDescription: This little yam was hiding beneath the snow
longDescription: he Snow Yam is a foraging item found only in Winter. Unlike other forage items found on the ground, to obtain a Snow Yam, you must dig with the Hoe. It's not necessary to dig at an Artifact Spot, although Snow Yams may be found at Artifact Spots. Snow Yams may be found by digging any tillable soil in Stardew Valley outside of The Farm (including The Desert). They may also be grown from Winter Wild Seeds. Snow Yams give no foraging experience when harvested around town.

name: crocus
source: Foraging in the Winter or grown from Winter Seeds
basicDescription: A flower that can bloom in the winter
longDescription: The Crocus is a flower found via foraging in the Winter, or grown from Winter wild seeds

name: holly
basicDescription: The leaves and bright red berries make a popular winter decoration.
longDescription: Holly is found via foraging in the Winter. Holly can be found throughout Stardew Valley, including in the Secret Woods

name: nautilusShell
source: Foraging on The Beach in the Winter
basicDescription: An ancient shell
longDescription: The Nautilus Shell is found via foraging at The Beach in winter. The player may randomly receive one in the mail from Demetrius. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

name: coral
basicDescription: A colony of tiny creatures that clump together to form beautiful structures.
longDescription: Coral is found via foraging at The Beach in all seasons.

name: seaUrchin
basicDescription: A slow-moving spiny creature that some consider a delicacy.
longDescription: The Sea Urchin is found via foraging at The Beach in all seasons. They spawn regularly across the broken bridge, which can be repaired with 300 wood (see The Beach). Emily may occasionally send you a Sea Urchin in the mail as a gift.

name: rainbowShell
source: Foraging the Beach in the Summer
basicDescription: It's a very beautiful shell.
longDescription: The Rainbow Shell is found via foraging at The Beach in the Summer. During the off-seasons, it can be obtained through the Traveling Cart. It may also be sent in the mail as a gift from Demetrius. It can also be received as a gift from Jas or Vincent at the Feast of the Winter Star.

name: caveCarrot
source: Foraging The Mines or Garbage Cans
basicDescription: A starchy snack found in caves. It helps miners work longer
longDescription: The Cave Carrot is found via foraging in The Mines. It can also be found in Garbage Cans. Large quantities can be easily obtained by digging underground patches of dirt in The Mines (on levels 10-20) with the Hoe.

name: coconut
source: Foraging in the Calico Desert or bought at Oasis
basicDescription: A seed of the coconut palm. It has many culinary uses
longDescription: The Coconut is an inedible Foraged Fruit found only in the Calico Desert. It can also be bought at the Oasis on Mondays for Gold.png200g or may randomly appear in the Traveling Cart's stock for Gold.png300-1,000g. Although it is inedible, it may be put in a Preserves Jar to make Coconut Jelly, or in a Keg to make Coconut Wine. Coconuts can not be planted to create Palm Trees.

name: cactusFruit
source: Foraging in the Calico Desert or bought in the Oasis or grown from Cactus Seeds
basicDescription: The sweet fruit of the prickly pear cactus
longDescription: The Cactus Fruit is found via foraging in the Calico Desert. It can also be bought at the Oasis on Tuesdays for Gold.png150g or randomly at the Traveling Cart for Gold.png225-1,000g. Cactus Fruit may also be grown from Cactus Seeds. Cactus Fruit grown from Cactus Seeds benefits from the Tiller Profession bonus.

name: tulip
source: Grown from Tulip Bulbs in the Spring
basicDescription: The most popular spring flower.  Has a very faint sweet smell.
longDescription: The Tulip is a flower crop that grows from Tulip Bulbs after 6 days. Tulips can be purchased from the Traveling Cart for Gold.png100-1,000g.

name: summerSpangle
source: Grown from Spangle Seeds in the Summer
basicDescription: A tropical bloom that thrives in the humid summer air. Has a sweet, tangy aroma
longDescription: Summer Spangle is a flower crop that grows from Spangle Seeds after 8 days.

name: fairyRose
source: Fairy Seeds grown in the Fall
basicDescription: An old folk legend suggests that the sweet smell of this flower attracts fairies.
longDescription: The Fairy Rose is a flower crop that grows from Fairy Seeds after 12 days. Although the profit margins on the Fairy Rose are not exceptional, the Honey made from the flowers represents the most profitable honey.

name: blueJazz
source: Jazz Seeds grown in the Spring
basicDescription: The flower grows in a sphere to invite as many butterflies as possible.
longDescription: Blue Jazz is a flower crop that grows from Jazz Seeds after 7 days.

name: rhubarb
source: Rhubarb Seeds grown in the Spring
basicDescription: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.
longDescription: Rhubarb is a fruit crop that grows from Rhubarb Seeds after 13 days. Rhubarb seeds can be purchased only from the Oasis, or occasionally from the Traveling Cart.

name: hotPepper
source: Pepper Sees grown in the Summer
basicDescription: Fiery hot with a hint of sweetness.
longDescription: The Hot Pepper is a fruit crop that grows from Pepper Seeds after 5 days. When harvested, each Hot Pepper plant gives 1 Hot Pepper every 3 days, with a small random chance for more Hot Peppers.

name: poppy
source: Poppy Seeds grown in the Summer
basicDescription: In addition to its colorful flower, the Poppy has culinary and medicinal uses
longDescription: The Poppy is a flower crop that grows from Poppy Seeds after 7 days.

name: melon
source: Melon Seeds grown in the Summer
basicDescription: A cool, sweet summer treat.
longDescription: The Melon is a fruit crop that grows from Melon Seeds after 12 days. Melon is one of only three crops that can grow into a giant crop.

name: blueberry
source: Blueberry Seeds grown in the Summer
basicDescription: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits. The blue skin has the highest nutrient concentration.
longDescription: The Blueberry is a fruit crop that grows from Blueberry Seeds after 13 days. A Preserves Jar can make Blueberries into jelly, and a Keg can make them into wine, which can then be aged in a Cask. When sold, blueberry prices benefit from the Tiller profession, and its jelly and wine prices benefit from the Artisan profession. Each harvest yields 3 Blueberries, with a small random chance for more.

name: cranberries
source: Cranberry Seeds grown in the Fall
longDescription: Cranberries are a fruit crop that grows from Cranberry Seeds after 7 days, and keeps producing fruit every 5 days after maturity. When harvested, each Cranberry plant gives 2 Cranberries every 5 days, with a small random chance for more Cranberries.

name: apple
source: Apple Tree grown from an Apple Tree harvested in the Fall
basicDescription: A crisp fruit used for juice and cider.
longDescription: The Apple is a fruit grown by planting an Apple Sapling, waiting 28 days for it to grow into an Apple Tree, and harvesting the tree during the Fall. An Apple may be purchased at the Traveling Cart for Gold.png300-1,000g or found in The Farm Cave, if the fruit bat option is chosen.

name: apricot
source: Apricot Tree grown from an Apricot Sapling harvested in the Spring
basicDescription: A tender little fruit with a rock-hard pit
longDescription: The Apricot is a fruit grown by planting an Apricot Sapling, waiting 28 days for it to grow into an Apricot Tree, and harvesting the tree during the Spring. An Apricot may be purchased at the Traveling Cart for Gold.png150-1,000g or found in The Farm Cave, if the fruit bat option is chosen.

name: mapleSyrup
source: Using a Tapper on a Maple Tree after 7 to 8 days
basicDescription: A sweet syrup with a unique flavor.
longDescription: Maple Syrup is Tree sap made from the Tapper when it is placed on a Maple Tree, taking Time Icon.png 7 to 8 days. Maple Syrup can be obtained by tapping Maple Trees growing on The Farm or growing naturally in Stardew Valley (e.g., in Cindersap Forest). Although Maple Syrup is labeled 'Artisan Good' in-game, it does not benefit from the Artisan Profession, but instead from the Tapper Profession (+25% sell price).

name: mapleSeed
basicDescription: Place this on your farm to plant a maple tree
longDescription: The Maple Seed is a seed that grows into a Maple Tree. It can be obtained by shaking/chopping down a Maple Tree at Foraging level 1, in Garbage Cans, or by using an Axe or Pickaxe to dig up a Maple Seed dropped by a fully grown Maple Tree on The Farm. A maple seed has approximately a 20% chance to grow to the next stage each night during Spring, Summer, or Fall. The median time to maturity is about 18 days, with over 90% of seeds maturing in less than 32 growing days.

name: lifeElixir
basicDescription: Restores health to full.
longDescription: Life Elixir is an edible crafted item. The recipe is earned at Combat skill level 2. Iridium Bats in the Skull Cavern may drop a Life Elixir when slain (5% chance). Despite the numbers listed on the tooltip, the Life Elixir will fully restore Health to maximum regardless of how low it currently is.

name: purpleMushroom
basicDescription: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.
longDescription: The Purple Mushroom is found via foraging in The Mines (starting at level 81), the Skull Cavern, from a tapped Mushroom Tree (rarely), or grown in the Mushroom Cave (rarely). It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. Purple Mushrooms can also be found on the Forest Farm Map during the Fall.

name: parsnipSoup
basicDescription: It's fresh and hearty
longDescription: Parsnip Soup is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Parsnip Soup may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained thru the mail after obtaining three friendship hearts with Caroline.

name: vegetableMedley
basicDescription: This is very nutritious
longDescription: Vegetable Medley (also called 'Vegetable Stew' in the Cooking interface) is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Vegetable Medley may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained thru the mail after gaining 7 friendship hearts with Caroline.

name: friedCalamari
basicDescription: It's so chewy
longDescription: Fried Calamari is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Fried Calamari may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. Although a type of squid, Midnight Squid does not count towards the recipe for Fried Calamari

name: strangeBun
basicDescription: What's inside?
longDescription: The Strange Bun is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Strange Bun may be dropped by a Shadow Brute (4% chance), and may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. It may also randomly rotate into stock at the Traveling Cart for Gold.png675-1,125g. By offering a Strange Bun to the Dark Shrine of Night Terrors in the Witch's Hut, players can toggle monster spawning on or off on their farm.

name: luckyLunch
basicDescription: A special little meal.
longDescription: Lucky Lunch is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Lucky Lunch may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained thru The Queen of Sauce on Year 2, Spring 28

name: friedMushroom
basicDescription: Earthy and aromatic
longDescription: Fried Mushroom is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Fried Mushroom may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. Recipe obtained from Demetrius thru the mail after gaining 3 friendship hearts.

name: beanHotpot
basicDescription: It sure is healthy
longDescription: Bean Hotpot is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Bean Hotpot may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in The Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. Recipe obtained from Clint thru the mail after gaining 7 hearts of friendship.

name: glazedYams
basicDescription: Sweet and satisfying.. The sugar gies it a hint of caramel
longDescription: Glazed Yams is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Glazed Yams may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock.

name: carpSurprise
basicDescription: It's bland and oily.
longDescription: Carp Surprise is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Turning the Carp into Sashimi will be even more profitable, however. Carp Surprise may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from The Queen of Sauce on Year 2 on Summer 7.

name: fishTaco
basicDescription: It smells delicious
longDescription: Fish Taco is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Fish Taco may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained from Linus thru the mail after obtaining 7 hearts of friendship.

name: crispyBass
basicDescription: Wow, the breading is perfect.
longDescription: Crispy Bass is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Crispy Bass may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained from Kent thru the mail after obtaining 3 hearts of friendship.

name: pepperPoppers
basicDescription: Spicy breaded peppers filled with cheese.
longDescription: Pepper Poppers is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Pepper Poppers may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained from Shane thru the mail after obtaining 3 hearts of friendship with him.

name: tomKhaSoup
basicDescription: These flavors are incredible!
longDescription: Tom Kha Soup is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Tom Kha Soup may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Sandy thru the mail after obtaining 7 hearts of friendship.

name: troutSoup
basicDescription: Pretty salty
longDescription: Trout Soup is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It may also be purchased at Willy's Fish Shop for Gold.png250g. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Trout Soup may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from the Queen of Sauce on Year 1, Fall 14

name: chocolateCake
basicDescription: Rich and moist with a thick fudge icing.
longDescription: Chocolate Cake is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Three Chocolate Cakes are the reward for completing the Bundle Red.png 2,500 Bundle in the Vault. Chocolate Cake may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from The Queen of Sauce on Year 1, Winter 14.

name: pinkCake
basicDescription: There's little heart candies on top.
longDescription: Pink Cake is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Three Pink Cakes are the reward for completing the Bundle Red.png Chef's Bundle on the Bulletin Board. Pink Cake can be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. It may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. If the player's character is male, after he earns Gold.png120,000g he will receive a letter from mom with a Pink Cake enclosed. The recipe can be obtained from The Queen of Sauce on Year 2 of Summer 21.

name: rhubarbPie
basicDescription: Mmm, tangy and sweet!
longDescription: Rhubarb Pie is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality rhubarb as well as wheat flour and sugar from the Mill. Rhubarb Pie may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe is obtained from Marnie thru the mail after obtaining 7 hearts of friendship.

name: cookie
basicDescription: Very chewy.
longDescription: Cookie is a cooked dish prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Cookies can be received as a gift from Evelyn at the Feast of the Winter Star, and are rarely found in the Garbage Can outside George and Evelyn's home. Cookies may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. If the player's character is male, after he earns Gold.png5,000g he will receive a letter from mom with cookies enclosed. The recipe is obtained from Evelyn after reaching 4 hearts of friendship.

name: friedEel
basicDescription: Greasy but powerful
longDescription: Fried Eel is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Fried Eel may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from George in the mail after three hearts of friendship.

name: spicyEel
basicDescription: It's really spicy! Be careful.
longDescription: Spicy Eel is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be dropped by a Serpent in the Skull Cavern (6% chance). Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Spicy Eel may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from George thru the mail after 7 hearts of friendship

name: sashimi
basicDescription: Raw fish sliced into thin pieces.
longDescription: Sashimi is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Sashimi may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. Note: This recipe can be profitable if using fish worth less than Gold.png75g (see When to turn your fish into sashimi for more info). Saving fish worth less than Gold.png75g for Help Wanted quests may be a better option, though, since these quests generally pay triple the fish's base value. (Periwinkle is an exception -- at Gold.png20g base price it's more profitable to turn into Sashimi than save for quests).

name: anyFish
basicDescription: An ingredient that includes any fish available in the game.
longDescription: An ingredient that includes any fish available in the game.

name: makiRoll
basicDescription: Fish and rice wrapped in seaweed
longDescription: Maki Roll is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Maki Roll may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from the Saloon or Queen of Sauce on Year 1 of Summer 21

name: tortilla
basicDescription: Can be used as a vessel for food
longDescription: Tortilla is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Tortilla may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained thru the Queen of Sauce on Year 1, Fall 7 or purchased at the Saloon

name: redPlate
basicDescription: Full of antioxidants
longDescription: Red Plate is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Red Plate may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. Recipe can be obtained from Emily thru the mail after reaching 7 hearts

name: eggplantParmesan
basicDescription: Tangy, cheesy, and wonderful
longDescription: Red Plate is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Red Plate may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Lewis after 7 friendship hearts.

name: ricePudding
basicDescription: It's creamy, sweet and fun to eat.
longDescription: Rice Pudding is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Rice Pudding may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from evelyn after 7 hearts of friendship

name: iceCream
basicDescription: It's hard to find someone who doesn't like this
longDescription: Ice Cream is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be purchased from Alex during Summer at the Ice Cream Stand for Gold.png250g, or at the Oasis on Sundays (year-round) for Gold.png240g. Ice Cream may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Jodi after 7 hearts of friendship

name: blueberryTart
basicDescription: It's subtle and refreshing
longDescription: Blueberry Tart is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Blueberry Tart may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Pierre after 3 hearts of friendship

name: autumnsBounty
basicDescription: A taste of the season
longDescription: Autumn's Bounty is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Five Autumn's Bounties are the reward for completing the Bundle Purple.png Exotic Foraging Bundle in the Crafts Room. Autumn's Bounty may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in The Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Demetrius thru the mail after 7 hearts of friendship.

name: pumpkinSoup
basicDescription: A seasonal favorite.
longDescription: Pumpkin Soup is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Pumpkin Soup may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Robin thru the mail after 7 hearts of friendship.

name: superMeal
basicDescription: It's a really energizing meal.
longDescription: Super Meal is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Super Meal may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Kent after 7 hearts of friendship.

name: cranberrySauce
basicDescription: A festive treat
longDescription: Cranberry Sauce is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Cranberry Sauce may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Gus after 7 friendship hearts.

name: stuffing
basicDescription: Ahh... the smell of warm bread and sage.
longDescription: Stuffing is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Stuffing may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays or in the Stardrop Saloon's rotating stock. The recipe can be obtained from Pam after 7 hearts of friendship.

name: farmersLunch
basicDescription: This'll keep you going.
longDescription: Farmer's Lunch is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It may also randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays. The recipe can be obtained after Farming Level 3

name: survivalBurger
basicDescription: A convenient snack for the explorer
longDescription: The Survival Burger is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It is also cooked by Gus during the Stardew Valley Fair and can be eaten for free. Survival Burger may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays. The recipe can be obtained after Foraging Level 2.

name: dishOTheSea
basicDescription: This'll keep you warm in the cold sea air.
longDescription: Dish O' The Sea is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The reward for completing the Bundle Red.png Specialty Fish Bundle in the Fish Tank is 5 Dish O' The Sea. Dish O' The Sea may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays. The recipe is obtained after Fishing level 3.

name: minersTreat
basicDescription: This should keep your energy up
longDescription: Miner's Treat is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be purchased any day from the Dwarf for Gold.png1,000g or randomly from Krobus' shop on Saturdays. Mummies in the Skull Cavern have a 4% chance of dropping a Miner's Treat. The recipe is obtained at Mining Level 3

name: rootsPlatter
basicDescription: This'll get you digging for more.
longDescription: Roots Platter is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. Roots Platter may randomly appear in Krobus' shop on Saturdays. The recipe is obtained after Combat Level 3.

name: algaeSoup
basicDescription: It's a little slimy.
longDescription: Algae Soup is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It may also be dropped by a Mutant Grub (10% chance). Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. The recipe is obtained from Clint after 3 friendship hearts.

name: paleBroth
basicDescription: A delicate broth with a hint of sulfur
longDescription: Pale Broth is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. The recipe is obtained from Marnie after 3 hearts of friendship.

name: plumPudding
basicDescription: A traditional holiday treat.
longDescription: Plum Pudding is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce on Year 1, Winter 7.

name: artichokeDip
basicDescription: It's cool and refreshing
longDescription: Artichoke Dip is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce in year 1 Fall 28.

name: stirFry
basicDescription: Julienned vegetables on a bed of rice.
longDescription: Stir Fry is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients and made with homemade Oil. The recipe can be obtained from The Queen of Sauce on Year 1, Spring 7.

name: roastedHazelnuts
basicDescription: The roasting process creates a rich forest flavor.
longDescription: Roasted Hazelnuts is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Summer 28.

name: pumpkinPie
basicDescription: Silky pumpkin cream in a flakey crust.
longDescription: Pumpkin Pie is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 1, Winter 21.

name: radishSalad
basicDescription: The radishes are so crisp!
longDescription: Radish Salad is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 1, Spring 21.

name: fruitSalad
basicDescription: A delicious combination of summer fruits.
longDescription: Fruit Salad is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Fall 7.

name: blackberryCobbler
basicDescription: There's quite nothing like it.
longDescription: Blackberry Cobbler is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. Note: this recipe can be profitable - it will result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients without Bear's Knowledge, or if using Wheat Flour and/or Sugar from the Mill. If the player has Bear's Knowledge and purchases Sugar and Wheat Flour from Pierre's General Store, using the lowest quality blackberry will result in the cost being equal to the sell price. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Fall 14.

name: cranberryCandy
basicDescription: It's sweet enough to mask the bitter fruit
longDescription: Cranberry Candy is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 1, Winter 28.

name: bruschetta
basicDescription: Roasted tomatoes on a crisp white bread.
longDescription: Bruschetta is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Winter 21

name: coleslaw
basicDescription: It's light, fresh and very healthy
longDescription: Coleslaw is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 1, Spring 14.

name: fiddleheadRisotto
basicDescription: A creamy rice dish served with sauteed fern heads. It's a little bland.
longDescription: Fiddlehead Risotto is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality ingredients and made with homemade Oil. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Fall 28.

name: poppyseedMuffin
basicDescription: It has a soothing effect.
longDescription: The Poppyseed Muffin is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star or bought at the Traveling Cart for Gold.png750-1,250g. Note: this recipe is profitable - it will always result in profit when using the lowest quality poppies as well as wheat flour and sugar from the Mill. The recipe is obtained from The Queen of Sauce from Year 2, Winter 7.

name: chowder
basicDescription: A perfect way to warm yourself after a cold night at sea.
longDescription: Chowder is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe can be obtained from Willy after 3 hearts of friendship.

name: lobsterBisque
basicDescription: This delicate soup is a secret family recipe of Willy's
longDescription: Lobster Bisque is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe can be obtained from Willy after 9 hearts of friendship or through the Queen of Sauce of Year 2, Winter 14.

name: escargot
basicDescription: Butter-soaked snails cooked to perfection.
longDescription: Escargot is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe can be obtained from Willy after 5 friendship hearts.

name: fishStew
basicDescription: It smells alot like the sea. Tastes better, though.
longDescription: Fish Stew is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. This recipe can be obtained from Willy after 7 friendship hearts.

name: mapleBar
basicDescription: It's a sweet doughnut topped with a rich maple glaze.
longDescription: Maple Bar is a cooked dish. It is prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. The recipe can be obtained through the Queen of Sauce on Year 2, Summer 14.

name: crabCakes
longDescription: Crab Cakes are a cooked dish. They are prepared using the kitchen inside an upgraded farmhouse. Iridium Crabs in the Skull Cavern may drop Crab Cakes when slain (50% chance). Gus will also sell an unlimited number of Crab Cakes at The Stardrop Saloon for Gold.png550g each for approximately 4 days after viewing Willy's 6-heart cutscene. The recipe can be obtained through the Queen of Sauce on Year 2, Fall 21.

name: quartz
basicDescription: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines
longDescription: Quartz is a Mineral that can be found by foraging in The Mines. It can also occasionally be found in Garbage Cans. Stone Golems have a 10% chance to drop Quartz when slain. Quartz can be destroyed by bombs. Quartz can be used along with 1 coal in a furnace to produce Refined Quartz, taking 1.5 in-game hours to smelt.

name: earthCrystal
basicDescription: A resinous substance found near the surface
longDescription: An Earth Crystal is a type of Mineral. It can be foraged in The Mines (especially floors 1 - 39), or obtained from Geodes and Omni Geodes, dropped from Duggies in the Mines (floors 1 - 29), or from panning. It can also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests. Wilderness Golems on the Wilderness Farm map have a 0.05% chance of dropping an Earth Crystal when slain. Earth Crystals can be destroyed by bombs.

name: frozenTear
basicDescription: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti
longDescription: The Frozen Tear is a Mineral. It can be foraged in the Mines (floors 40 - 79), or dropped by Dust Sprites (2% drop rate). It can also be found by panning, inside Frozen Geodes and Omni Geodes, or in Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player reaches level 40 of the mines. It can be destroyed by bombs.

name: emerald
source: The Mines from an Emerald Node or Gem Node
basicDescription: A precious stone with a brilliant green color
longDescription: The Emerald is a Mineral. It can be obtained from Emerald Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines, from panning, or in Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 81 of the mines. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

name: fireQuartz
basicDescription: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava
longDescription: Fire Quartz is a Mineral. It can be foraged in the Mines (floors 80+) or found inside a Magma Geode or Omni Geode. It can also be found by panning or inside Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player reaches level 81 of the mines. Fire Quartz can be destroyed by bombs. Fire Quartz can be used along with 1 coal in a furnace to produce 3 Refined Quartz, taking 1.5 in-game hours to smelt.

name: aquamarine
basicDescription: A shimmery blue-green gem
longDescription: Aquamarine is a Mineral. It can be obtained from Aquamarine Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 40+), from panning, and from Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 41 of the mines.

name: ruby
basicDescription: A precious stone that is sought after for its rich color and beautiful luster.
longDescription: The Ruby is a Mineral that can be found in Ruby Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 80+), by panning, in Fishing Treasure Chests, or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. It may also occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 81 of the mines.

name: amethyst
basicDescription: A purple variant of quartz
longDescription: Amethyst is a Mineral that can be obtained from Amethyst Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines, panning, or as a rare drop from Green Slimes. It may also occasionally be found in Fishing Treasure Chests or in a Garbage Can.

name: topaz
basicDescription: Fairly common but still prized for its beauty.
longDescription: Topaz is a type of Mineral that can be obtained from Topaz Nodes and Gem Nodes in The Mines, from panning, or found in Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can.

name: jade
basicDescription: A pale green ornamental stone.
longDescription: Jade is a Mineral that can be found in Jade Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 40+), dropped by Blue Slimes, in Fishing Treasure Chests, or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. Jade may also occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 41 of the mines.

name: diamond
basicDescription: A rare and valuable gem.
longDescription: The Diamond is a Mineral that can be obtained from Diamond Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines on floors 50+. A diamond may also be dropped by any Monster once you have reached the bottom of the Mines. Before reaching the bottom of the Mines, a Diamond may be dropped by a Red or Purple Slime, or a Duggy. A Wilderness Golem may also rarely drop a diamond (0.1% chance). Diamonds may also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests or by panning. After the player has reached level 40 of the Mines, they may also be found in Garbage Cans. A Diamond is arguably the best gem to duplicate in the Crystalarium, providing the largest source of money as a gem.

name: tigerseye
basicDescription: A stripe of shimmering gold gives this gem a warm luster.
longDescription: Tigerseye is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: opal
basicDescription: Its internal structure causes it to reflect a rainbow of light.
longDescription: Opal is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: fireOpal
basicDescription: A rare variety of opal, named for its red spots.
longDescription: Fire Opal is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: alamite
basicDescription: ts distinctive fluorescence makes it a favorite among rock collectors.
longDescription: Alamite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: bixite
source: Magma Geode, Omni Geode, Black Slime
basicDescription: A dark metallic Mineral sought after for its cubic structure.
longDescription: Bixite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode. It can also be dropped by Black Slimes.

name: baryte
basicDescription: The best specimens resemble a desert rose.
longDescription: Baryte is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: aerinite
basicDescription: These crystals are curiously light.
longDescription: Aerinite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: calcite
basicDescription: This yellow crystal is speckled with shimmering nodules.
longDescription: Calcite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: dolomite
basicDescription: It can occur in coral reefs, often near an underwater volcano.
longDescription: Dolomite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: esperite
basicDescription: The crystals glow bright green when stimulated.
longDescription: Esperite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: fluorapatite
basicDescription: Small amounts are found in human teeth.
longDescription: Fluorapatite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: geminite
basicDescription: Occurs in brilliant clusters.
longDescription: Geminite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: helvite
basicDescription: It grows in a triangular column.
longDescription: Helvite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: jamborite
basicDescription: The crystals are so tightly packed it almost looks fuzzy.
longDescription: Jamborite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: jagoite
basicDescription: A high volume of tiny crystals makes it very glittery.
longDescription: Jagoite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: kyanite
basicDescription: The geometric faces are as smooth as glass.
longDescription: Kyanite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: lunarite
basicDescription: The cratered white orbs form a tight cluster.
longDescription: Lunarite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: malachite
basicDescription: A popular ornamental stone, used in sculpture and to make green paint.
longDescription: Malachite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: neptunite
source: Magma Geode, Omni Geode, Black Slime
basicDescription: A jet-black crystal that is unusually reflective.
longDescription: Neptunite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode. It can also be dropped by Black Slimes.

name: lemonStone
basicDescription: Some claim the powdered crystal is a dwarvish delicacy.
longDescription: Lemon Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode. Despite its description, the dwarf doesn't actually enjoy being gifted one.

name: nekoite
basicDescription: The delicate shards form a tiny pink meadow.
longDescription: Nekoite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: orpiment
basicDescription: Despite its high toxicity, this Mineral is widely used in manufacturing and folk medicine.
longDescription: Orpiment is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: petrifiedSlime
basicDescription: This little guy may be 100,000 years old.
longDescription: Petrified Slime is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode. It may also be found inside Slime Balls produced in a Slime Hutch.

name: thunderEgg
basicDescription: According to legend, angry thunder spirits would throw these stones at one another.
longDescription: Thunder Egg is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: pyrite
basicDescription: Commonly known as 'Fool's Gold'.
longDescription: Pyrite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: oceanStone
basicDescription: An old legend claims these stones are the mosaics of ancient mermaids.
longDescription: Ocean Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: ghostCrystal
basicDescription: There is an aura of coldness around this crystal.
longDescription: Ghost Crystal is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: jasper
basicDescription: When polished, this stone becomes attactively luminous. Prized by ancient peoples for thousands of years.
longDescription: Jasper is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: celestine
basicDescription: Some early life forms had bones made from this.
longDescription: Celestine is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: marble
basicDescription: A very popular material for sculptures and construction.
longDescription: Marble is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: sandstone
basicDescription: A common type of stone with red and brown striations.
longDescription: Sandstone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: granite
basicDescription: A speckled Mineral that is commonly used in construction.
longDescription: Granite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: basalt
basicDescription: Forms near searing hot magma.
longDescription: Basalt is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: limestone
basicDescription: A very common type of stone. It's not worth very much.
longDescription: Limestone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: soapstone
basicDescription: Because of its relatively soft consistency, this stone is very popular for carving.
longDescription: Soapstone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: hematite
basicDescription: An iron-based Mineral with interesting magnetic properties.
longDescription: Hematite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: mudstone
basicDescription: A fine-grained rock made from ancient clay or mud.
longDescription: Mudstone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: obsidian
basicDescription: A volcanic glass that forms when lava cools rapidly.
longDescription: Obsidian is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: slate
basicDescription: t's extremely resistant to water, making it a good roofing material.
longDescription: Slate is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: fairyStone
basicDescription: An old miner's song suggests these are made from the bones of ancient fairies.
longDescription: Fairy Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: starShards
basicDescription: No one knows how these form. Some scientists claim that the microscopic structure displays unnatural regularity.
longDescription: Star Shards are a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

name: geode
basicDescription: A blacksmith can break this open for you.
longDescription: The Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. It can be obtained from breaking rocks above ground in Stardew Valley and in The Mines (especially floors 1 - 39), or dropped by Duggies. It may also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. The geode can be broken open by Clint in the Blacksmith shop for Gold.png25g.

name: frozenGeode
basicDescription: A blacksmith can break this open for you.
longDescription: The Frozen Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. It can be found on levels 41 to 79 of The Mines, on the farm in the Winter, or inside a Fishing Treasure Chest. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. The Frozen Geode can be broken open by Clint in the Blacksmith shop for Gold.png25g.

name: magmaGeode
basicDescription: blacksmith can break this open for you.
longDescription: The Magma Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. It can be found on levels 81 to 119 of The Mines or in Fishing Treasure Chests. It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star. It may be additionally be found by breaking boxes and barrels in the Skull Cavern. The Magma Geode can be broken open by Clint in the Blacksmith shop for Gold.png25g.

name: omniGeode
basicDescription: A blacksmith can break this open for you. These geodes contain a wide variety of Minerals.
longDescription: The Omni Geode is a Mineral deposit found primarily by breaking rocks in The Mines. It must be broken open at the Blacksmith for Gold.png25g to obtain the items inside. Omni Geodes can contain minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. Omni Geodes can be found while panning, on all levels of The Mines, and on all levels of the Skull Cavern. Carbon Ghosts have a 99% chance to drop one Omni Geode when slain. Omni Geodes can also be purchased from the Oasis on Wednesdays for Gold.png1,000g, and from Krobus on Tuesdays for Gold.png300g. Five Omni Geodes are the reward for completing the Bundle Purple.png Geologist's Bundle in the Boiler Room. Neither daily luck nor luck buffs affect the contents of an Omni Geode.
